channel.title: Chaishop Bleep (Electro, Techno, House)
channel.itunes:author: Chaishop.com
channel.description:
Chaishop.com presents it´s new audio show: Chaishop Bleep - a monthly journey through the world of electro, house, techno and minimal tunes. Recorded at Chaishop.com studios in Hamburg, Germany.
Chaishop.com is the world´s No.1 website for Trance & Trance culture and has been active for 9 years. As the trance scene is opening up for new styles of electronic music, this show has been specially created to show the world what electro, house and techno have to offer. Expect only great music on this show!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Chaishop.com presents Chaishop Bleep - a monthly journey through the world of electro, house, techno and minimal tunes. Recorded at Chaishop.com studios in Hamburg, Germany.

As the trance scene is opening up for new styles of electronic music, this show has been specially created to show the world what electro, house and techno have to offer. Expect only great music on this show!

item.title: Chaishop Bleep
item.itunes:author: Chaishop.com
item.description:
Chaishop Music News presents Chaishop Bleep - a monthly journey through the world of electro, house, techno and minimal tunes. Recorded at Chaishop.com studios in Hamburg, Germany.
This show is being presented by DJ Skunkbeat and DJ Sam@Chaishop.com. The DJ set is by DJ D-Nox (Sprout - Germany).
Playlist: Gui Boratto - Haute Couture (Kompakt) Paolo Mojo - Nightlaw (OOSH Music) Ido Ophir & Miki Litvak - Shnorkel (Dousk Rmx) Sunshine Jones - If you wouldn´t mind (Tiger Stripes Rmx) (King Street Sounds) Martin Eyerer - Barber´s Pole (Kling Klong) Stan Kolev - Breakout (James Harcourt Rmx) ( Baroque) Christian Smith & John Selway - Total Departure (Cirez - D Rmx) (Drumcode) Mind - X - Sensation Seekers (Martin Roth´s Nustyle Rmx) (Sirup) Oliver Koletzki - Music from the Heart (H.O.S.H.) (Hell Yeah)
Send us feedback! bleep@chaishop.com Visit us on the web at http://bleep.chaishop.com or www.myspace.com/chaishopmusicnews
Please support the artists and labels that produce and release the music that we all love by buying their releases!
This content is being provided by: Chaishop Guatemala Owner Oscar Castaneda 29 calle 17-37 Zona 12 Casa 12 01012 Guatemala Guatemala

item.title: Chaishop Bleep
item.itunes:author: Chaishop.com
item.description:
Chaishop Music News presents Chaishop Bleep - a monthly journey through the world of electro, house, techno and minimal tunes. Recorded at Chaishop.com studios in Hamburg, Germany.
This show is being presented by DJ Skunkbeat and DJ Kiko Purper. LIVE set by Heerhorst & Meissner.

item.description:

This show is being presented by DJ Skunkbeat and DJ Sam@Chaishop.com. After the show we got a dj set of DJ Fex (Robotronic - France).

item.title: CMN 075: Chaishop Bleep Special
item.itunes:author: Chaishop.com
item.description:
Chaishop Music News presents Chaishop Bleep - a monthly journey through the world of electro, house, techno and minimal tunes. Recorded at Chaishop.com studios in Hamburg, Germany.
This show is being presented by DJ Skunkbeat and DJ Kiko Purper. After the show we got a electro house set of DJ Sam@Chaishop.com (Chaishop - Germany) which has been recorded at this year's Vuuv Festival in Germany.
Playlist: • Cirez- D - Horizons (Mouseville) • Lützenkirchen - Gina (Tabula Rasa) • Adam K - Pushin (Hotbox Digital) • Quiver - Dancing in Dark Rooms with Bright Lights (Jim Rivers Rmx) (Boz Boz) • Markus Lange - Uncontrollable (Empee & Hantaan Rmx) (Craft Music) • Martin Eyerer & Stephan Hinz - Tucan (Nic Fanciulli Rmx) (Renaissance) • Marc Romboy - Sunburst (Simple Records) • Jamie Jones - Panama City (Crosstown Rebels) • Bukkador & Fishbeck - Nachtexpress (MBF) • Babylon Roots & Ante Perry - Der Urknall (Systematic)

Chaishop Music News presents Chaishop Bleep - a monthly journey through the world of electro, house, techno and minimal tunes. Recorded at Chaishop.com studios in Hamburg, Germany.
This show is being presented by DJ Skunkbeat and DJ Kiko Purper. After the show we got a electro house set of DJ Sam@Chaishop.com (Chaishop - Germany) which has been recorded at this year's Vuuv Festival in Germany.
Playlist: • Cirez- D - Horizons (Mouseville) • Lützenkirchen - Gina (Tabula Rasa) • Adam K - Pushin (Hotbox Digital) • Quiver - Dancing in Dark Rooms with Bright Lights (Jim Rivers Rmx) (Boz Boz) • Markus Lange - Uncontrollable (Empee & Hantaan Rmx) (Craft Music) • Martin Eyerer & Stephan Hinz - Tucan (Nic Fanciulli Rmx) (Renaissance) • Marc Romboy - Sunburst (Simple Records) • Jamie Jones - Panama City (Crosstown Rebels) • Bukkador & Fishbeck - Nachtexpress (MBF) • Babylon Roots & Ante Perry - Der Urknall (Systematic)
Send us feedback! cmn@chaishop.com Visit us on the web at www.chaishop.com/musicnews or www.myspace.com/chaishopmusicnews
Please support the artists and labels that produce and release the music that we all love by buying their releases!

item.title: Chaishop Bleep Special 3
item.itunes:author: Chaishop.com
item.description:
Chaishop Music News presents a new show special: Chaishop Bleep - a monthly journey through the world of electro, house, techno and minimal tunes. Recorded at Chaishop.com studios in Hamburg, Germany.
Chaishop.com is the world´s No.1 website for Trance & Trance culture and has been active for 10 years. As the trance scene is opening up for new styles of electronic music, this show has been specially created to show the world what electro, house and techno have to offer. Expect only great music on this show!
This show is being presented by DJ Skunkbeat and DJ Kiko Purper.
After the show we got a minimal techno dj set of the Hamburg based Marco Morelle.
Playlist: • Supreme Beings of Leisure - Strange Love Addiction (Alienato & Morus Rmx) • Shlomi Aber- Portico (Be as One) • Andre Oliva - Sonbatiki ( Viva Music) • Mr. V . & Ms Patty - Da Bump (Ame Rmx) (Defected) • D-Nox & Beckers - Shanghigh (Electribe) • David Ame & Julio Navas - Bungee (Fresco) • Dj Delicious - We Won´t Stop (Phunkwerk) • Vandal - Idiots (Audiojack Rmx) (Lot49) • Lützenkirchen - Music for The Girls (Huggotron Rmx) (Great Stuff)
Send us feedback! cmn@chaishop.com And visit our Website at www.chaishop.com/musicnews
Please support the artists and labels that produce and release the music that we all love by buying their releases!
This content is being provided by: Chaishop Guatemala Owner Oscar Castaneda 29 calle 17-37 Zona 12 Casa 12 01012 Guatemala Guatemala

item.description:
Chaishop Music News presents a new show special: Chaishop Bleep - a monthly journey through the world of electro, house, techno and minimal tunes. Recorded at Chaishop.com studios in Hamburg, Germany.
Chaishop.com is the world´s No.1 website for Trance & Trance culture and has been active for 10 years. As the trance scene is opening up for new styles of electronic music, this show has been specially created to show the world what electro, house and techno have to offer.
